dict.acceptation: 教练；驯兽师，驯马师；<英>教练机；<美>瞄准手；

sent.orig: A trainer from Fort Benning's 2nd Battalion, 29th Infantry Regiment, he and fellow trainer, Staff Sgt.
sent.trans: 教练本宁堡的第二营，第29步兵团，他和同伴教员，参谋军士。

sent.orig: Come and connect with personal trainer right now, to taste the goods of personal trainer course.
sent.trans: 不要再考虑，立即联络会所的私人教练，开始亲身体验私人健身课程无可比拟的好处！

sent.orig: The Gym has several treadmills an X-trainer machine, bicycles, weights and mats for floor work.
sent.trans: 体育馆里配备了：跑步机、教练机、自行车、哑铃和专为做地板运动准备的垫子。

sent.orig: I got me a trainer, I got me a weight program.
sent.trans: 我得到了我的教练，我得到了我的体重计划。

sent.orig: The trainer should check the information that it contains and add his signature.
sent.trans: 驯马教练须核对信息并添加亲笔签名。
